long_description: The Kelty Journey 2.0 child carrier offers comfort and convenience that is sure to please parents and little ones alike, with a refined, comfortable and easy-to-use design. Lightweight aluminum frame and patented Auto-Deploy(TM) kickstand with no-pinch hinges provide a stable platform for loading and unloading your child. Padded and contoured hipbelt and shoulder straps offer long hours of carrying comfort; easy torso-length adjustment allows easy fitting changes between short and tall parents. Adjustable child cockpit features a padded, 5-point harness, toy loops and removable, washable chin pad; removable sunshade enhances comfort and protection. Front compartment, hipbelt pocket, side water bottle pockets and under-seat storage offer room for food, bottles and diapers. The Kelty Journey 2.0 child carrier features a hydration-ready design that accommodates a reservoir and drink tube (sold separately).
short_description: The Kelty Journey 2.0 child carrier offers comfort and convenience that is sure to please parents and little ones alike, with a refined, comfortable and easy-to-use design.
